name: Mass effect, but on the Ps1
name_original: Mass effect, but on the Ps1
description:
This game was originally made for the Retro Game Jam

 https://itch.io/jam/retro-jam-2021

The theme was "Side-Effects" but the game itself doesn't follow that specific theme.

I always wanted to see how a Mass Effect game will be with the aesthetics of survival horror. It took me a while, but I was able to finish a simple level just in time. I hope you find the game entertaining!

Thanks for playing
